REST API repository TODOS¶

async src.repository.todos.create_todo(body: TodoSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.repository.todos.delete_todo(todo_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.repository.todos.get_all_todos(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession)¶

The get_all_todos function returns a list of all todos in the database.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of todos returned

  • offset – int: Specify how many rows to skip

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database connection to the function

Returns:

A list of todo objects

Doc-author:

Trelent

async src.repository.todos.get_todo(todo_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

The get_todo function takes in an id, and returns the todo object with that id.

Parameters:

  • todo_id – int: Specify the id of the todo to get

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function

  • user – User: Get the user who created the todo

Returns:

A todo object

async src.repository.todos.get_todos(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

The get_todos function returns a list of todos for the user.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of todos returned

  • offset – int: Skip the first n results

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass a database connection to the function

  • user – User: Filter the todos by user

Returns:

A list of todo objects

Doc-author:

Trelent

async src.repository.todos.update_todo(todo_id: int, body: TodoUpdateSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

REST API routes Auth¶

async src.routes.auth.confirmed_email(token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶
async src.routes.auth.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(OAuth2PasswordRequestForm), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶
async src.routes.auth.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(HTTPBearer), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶
async src.routes.auth.request_email(username: str, response: Response, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶
async src.routes.auth.signup(body: UserSchema, bt: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶
The signup function creates a new user in the database.

It takes in a UserSchema object, which is validated by pydantic. If the email already exists, it raises an HTTPException with status code 409 (Conflict). Otherwise, it hashes the password and creates a new user using create_user from repositories/users.py.

Parameters:

  • body – UserSchema: Validate the request body

  • bt – BackgroundTasks: Add a task to the background tasks queue

  • request – Request: Get the base url of the application

  • db – AsyncSession: Get the database session

Returns:

A user object

Doc-author:

Trelent
